body:
- Fixed many various crashes
- Fixed flying unit pickup glitchyness and jumping
- Fixed admin status not saving
- Fixed many bugs in dedicated server admin system
- Fixed power system working incorrectly in many cases
- Fixed editor glitching out on resize
- Fixed mobile users shooting at nothing
- Fixed (untested) items not disappearing
- Fixed constant strange errors in dedicated server which lead to client crashes
- Improved power output of combustion generator
- Made flying units appear later in waves
- Added additional startup info dialog
- Added freebuild mode
- Added ability for admins to schedule waves in freebuild servers
name: 4.0 Build 44 - Unstable Alpha
